ruling: - This card's effect activates in the Graveyard. If [[Destiny Hero - Double Dude]] is removed from play its effect will not activate.

- If [[Destiny Hero - Double Dude]] is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard while in the hand or Deck its effect still activates, and you can Special Summon the 2 "Double Dude Tokens". It could be destroyed in the hand or Deck by effects like [[Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin]] or [[Chain Destruction]].
